verses.verse: וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> He cried בְאָזְנַ֗י <WH241> also in mine ears ק֤וֹל <WH6963> voice גָּדוֹל֙ <WH1419> with a loud לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying קָרְב֖וּ <WH7126> to draw near פְּקֻדּ֣וֹת <WH6486> Cause them that have charge הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> over the city וְאִ֛ישׁ <WH376> even every man כְּלִ֥י <WH3627> weapon מַשְׁחֵת֖וֹ <WH4892> [with] his destroying בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> in his hand

וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold שִׁשָּׁ֣ה <WH8337> And behold six אֲנָשִׁ֡ים <WH376> and every man בָּאִ֣ים ׀ <WH935> came מִדֶּרֶךְ־ <WH1870> from the way שַׁ֨עַר <WH8179> gate הָעֶלְי֜וֹן <WH5945> of the higher אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <WH834> which מָפְנֶ֣ה <WH6437> which lieth צָפ֗וֹנָה <WH6828> toward the north וְאִ֨ישׁ <WH376> man כְּלִ֤י <WH3627> weapon מַפָּצוֹ֙ <WH4660> a slaughter בְּיָד֔וֹ <WH3027> in his hand וְאִישׁ־ <WH376> man אֶחָ֤ד <WH259> and one בְּתוֹכָם֙ <WH8432> among לָבֻ֣שׁ <WH3847> them [was] clothed בַּדִּ֔ים <WH906> with linen וְקֶ֥סֶת <WH7083> inkhorn הַסֹּפֵ֖ר <WH5608> with a writer's בְּמָתְנָ֑יו <WH4975> by his side וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> and they went in וַיַּ֣עַמְד֔וּ <WH5975> and stood אֵ֖צֶל <WH681> beside מִזְבַּ֥ח <WH4196> altar הַנְּחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> the brasen

וּכְב֣וֹד ׀ <WH3519> And the glory אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel נַעֲלָה֙ <WH5927> was gone up מֵעַ֤ל <WH5921> from הַכְּרוּב֙ <WH3742> from the cherub אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> had been עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> and אֶ֖ל <WH413> to מִפְתַּ֣ן <WH4670> whereupon he was to the threshold הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> of the house וַיִּקְרָ֗א <WH7121> And he called אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> to the man הַלָּבֻ֣שׁ <WH3847> clothed הַבַּדִּ֔ים <WH906> with linen אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> whose קֶ֥סֶת <WH7083> inkhorn הַסֹּפֵ֖ר <WH5608> which [had] the writer's בְּמָתְנָֽיו׃ <WH4975> by his side ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God [אֵלֹו כ] (אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> about ק) עֲבֹר֙ <WH5674> unto him Go through בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> the midst הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> of the city בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> through the midst יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וְהִתְוִ֨יתָ <WH8427> and set תָּ֜ו <WH8420> a mark עַל־ <WH5921> over מִצְח֣וֹת <WH4696> upon the foreheads הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH582> of the men הַנֶּֽאֱנָחִים֙ <WH584> that sigh וְהַנֶּ֣אֱנָקִ֔ים <WH602> and that cry עַ֚ל <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַתּ֣וֹעֵב֔וֹת <WH8441> for all the abominations הַֽנַּעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> that be done בְּתוֹכָֽהּ׃ <WH8432> in the midst

וּלְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> And to the others אָמַ֣ר <WH559> he said בְּאָזְנַ֔י <WH241> in mine hearing עִבְר֥וּ <WH5674> Go בָעִ֛יר <WH5892> him through the city אַחֲרָ֖יו <WH310> ye after וְהַכּ֑וּ <WH5221> and smite [עַל־ כ] (אַל־ <WH5921> and תָּחֹ֥ס <WH408> nay ק) [עֵינֵיכֶם כ] (עֵינְכֶ֖ם <WH5869> affliction ק) וְאַל־ <WH408> not תַּחְמֹֽלוּ׃ <WH2550> neither have ye pity

זָקֵ֡ן <WH2205> old בָּח֣וּר <WH970> [and] young וּבְתוּלָה֩ <WH1330> both maids וְטַ֨ף <WH2945> and little children וְנָשִׁ֜ים <WH802> and women תַּהַרְג֣וּ <WH2026> Slay לְמַשְׁחִ֗ית <WH4889> utterly וְעַל־ <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> any אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> any man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom עָלָ֤יו <WH5921> and הַתָּו֙ <WH8420> upon whom [is] the mark אַל־ <WH408> not תִּגַּ֔שׁוּ <WH5066> but come not near וּמִמִּקְדָּשִׁ֖י <WH4720> at my sanctuary תָּחֵ֑לּוּ <WH2490> and begin וַיָּחֵ֙לּוּ֙ <WH2490> Then they began בָּאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <WH376> man הַזְּקֵנִ֔ים <WH2205> at the ancient אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> which [were] before הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> the house

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH413> to טַמְּא֣וּ <WH2930> unto them Defile אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּ֗יִת <WH1004> the house וּמַלְא֧וּ <WH4390> and fill אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֲצֵר֛וֹת <WH2691> the courts חֲלָלִ֖ים <WH2491> with the slain צֵ֑אוּ <WH3318> go ye forth וְיָצְא֖וּ <WH3318> And they went forth וְהִכּ֥וּ <WH5221> and slew בָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> in the city

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become כְּהַכּוֹתָ֔ם <WH5221> And it came to pass while they were slaying וְנֵֽאשֲׁאַ֖ר <WH7604> them and I was left אָ֑נִי <WH589> I וָאֶפְּלָ֨ה <WH5307> that I fell עַל־ <WH5921> on פָּנַ֜י <WH6440> upon my face וָאֶזְעַ֗ק <WH2199> and cried וָֽאֹמַר֙ <WH559> and said אֲהָהּ֙ <WH162> Ah אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD הֲמַשְׁחִ֣ית <WH7843> wilt thou destroy אַתָּ֗ה <WH859> you אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> all the residue יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּשָׁפְכְּךָ֥ <WH8210> in thy pouring out אֶת־ <WH853> חֲמָתְךָ֖ <WH2534> of thy fury עַל־ <WH5921> and יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> Jerusalem

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me עֲוֹ֨ן <WH5771> he unto me The iniquity בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> of Israel וִֽיהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> and Judah גָּדוֹל֙ <WH1419> great בִּמְאֹ֣ד <WH3966> is very מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> very וַתִּמָּלֵ֤א <WH4390> is full הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> and the land דָּמִ֔ים <WH1818> of blood וְהָעִ֖יר <WH5892> and the city מָלְאָ֣ה <WH4390> full מֻטֶּ֑ה <WH4297> of perverseness כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אָמְר֗וּ <WH559> for they say עָזַ֤ב <WH5800> hath forsaken יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> The LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the earth וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> else יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> and the LORD רֹאֶֽה׃ <WH7200> seeth

וְגַ֨ם־ <WH1571> again אֲנִ֔י <WH589> I לֹא־ <WH3808> no תָח֥וֹס <WH2347> shall not spare עֵינִ֖י <WH5869> And as for me also mine eye וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor אֶחְמֹ֑ל <WH2550> neither will I have pity דַּרְכָּ֖ם <WH1870> their way בְּרֹאשָׁ֥ם <WH7218> upon their head נָתָֽתִּי׃ <WH5414> [but] I will recompense

וְהִנֵּ֞ה <WH2009> behold הָאִ֣ישׁ ׀ <WH376> And behold the man לְבֻ֣שׁ <WH3830> apparel הַבַּדִּ֗ים <WH906> with linen אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whose הַקֶּ֙סֶת֙ <WH7083> which [had] the inkhorn בְּמָתְנָ֔יו <WH4975> by his side מֵשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> reported דָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> the matter לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying עָשִׂ֕יתִי <WH6213> I have done [כַאֲשֶׁר כ] (כְּכֹ֖ל ק) (אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whose ק) צִוִּיתָֽנִי׃ <WH6680> as thou hast commanded ס
